entry.title: Hello, Welcome to my space!
entry.content:
- Enjoy your moment here!

I am a girl, applying for PhD program in Chemistry Science, mainly concentrating on directions like Metallic Catalysis, Nano-materials Application, Battery Materials. I, also with great enthusiasic to puruse everything interestingly. Wish everyone here can find some fun and joy, similarity and variety…… …….

entry.title: What Research I have done
entry.content:
Discover something similarly

From Bachelor to Master degree, majoring in Enviroenmental Science to Environmental Chemistry. Sustaniable chemistry is a promising major. We devote looking for creative and effective method to generate greenable enery. Maybe here, with some intro to my research experience, you can discove something similarity and inspiration……

entry.title: Some scenery I have recorded
entry.content:
- Take in the scenery with our prespective

From 2021 to 2022, the COVID-19 situation still not be optimistic in worldwide. I am appreciating the contribution of China goverment. Therefore, Falcon and I can still safely reach many places of our mainland. From Ulanqab to Hainan, Shangsha to Mount Gongga. We hope that we still can travel to many other beautiful landscape. Wish you can enjoy your moment here with our records……
 


From Ulanqab to Hainan
From volcano to sea

From starry sky to sunset

My Research Experience

With some aritles published on the Chemistsy Catalysis and Envrionmental Science direction publications, so I accoumulate many skills and ablibity to do projects and researches indepently, Some experiences are listed below.......

 

Research/Project Experiences

  National Nature Science Foundation of China(NSFC) | 2018.10-present

  • Director: Prof. Jinping Jia & Prof. Kan Li
  • Topic: Composition System of Electrochemical H2 Evolution and Bimetallic catalytic for Nitrate Reduction

 National Contest on Energy Saving and Emission Reduction | 2015.04-2016.05

  • Mentor: Prof. Kuan Zhao
  • Topic: Design an efficient device for degrading volatile organic gas (VOCs)

 Undergraduate Course Graduation Thesis | 2017.04-2018.05

  • Director: Prof. Fasong Li
  • Topic: Effect of Burning Ban Regulations on Anqing’s Air Quality during the Spring Festival

My Interesrs & Hobbits

From Sports to Running, Photography to Vedio clip, I would like to travel all corner of the world, within the limited lifetime, make more friends with people who also have the most enthusiastic，passionate and same interests.
